doc.title: Knockout Queens 2004-05 Vol. 1
doc.plot: When the sun sets on some urban streets, people come out to party, drink and some just want to fight. Knockout Queens went to some of the craziest strip clubs and found some of the toughest chicks out there. They gladly stepped in the ring to bring you some of the most action-packed rounds you've ever seen! Hold on to your seat & see what happens when a round stops, but the fighting continues!
